content.raw:
@dan77062 yes, the VPN link goes inside the field computer container. Inside the field computer docker container, the default `ROS_MASTER_URI` is set to the simulator IP so that the your code can talk to the simulator. I assuming you also want o use ROS for communication between OCU and field computer? To do this, you'll need to overwrite the `ROS_MASTER_URI` env variable in your script to the field computer IP before starting `roscore`, e.g.

Inside FC container, do:

~~~
ROS_MASTER_URI=http://192.168.2.10:11311 roscore
~~~

On OCU, after starting vpn:

~~~
ROS_MASTER_URI=http://192.168.2.10:11311 rostopic list
~~~

you should be able to get topics from FC
